headline: Assessing General Mills (GIS) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: General Mills (GIS) is back on investors’ radar after recent share weakness, with the stock down about 5% over the past month and roughly 4% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for General Mills. The recent 30 day share price decline of 5% and year to date share price decline of 2.21% sit alongside a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 21.49%, which points to fading momentum despite the latest 1 day and 7 day gains. If the recent weakness in packaged food names has you...

headline: PE-backed Violet Foods buys Muir Glen from General Mills
summary: Muir Glen’s range includes canned and jarred tomatoes, pasta and pizza sauces, salsas and ketchup.

headline: Mining stocks have been on a tear, with gold passing $5,000. Analysts are split on what's next
summary: Appetite for mining stocks has cooled over the past six months, according to a Citi note.
